channel.title: 2 Client Errors. [Non-renamed]
channel.description:
This error only occurs when I attack the Npc, also, ignore the T2 error, that was me just messing around. Trying to fix the Npc error on my own. I was thinking, maybe I get this error because the Npc is 508+?
Help, please.
[IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/ClientError.jpg[/img]
&&
Also, when I talk to my Npc, his model of his face doesn't show up on the dialogue;
[b]Mine:[/b] [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/NpcDialogue.jpg[/img]
[b]Should be:[/b] [IMG]http://i268.photobucket.com/albums/jj37/fr0stmage/2h2dr8l.jpg[/img]
